Headline: #29 State Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lafayette/91st
ShortDescription: Southbound 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 87th, King Drive and 95th: due to, street blockage near Lafayette/91st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via Lafayette, 87th, King Drive and 95th: due to, street blockage near Lafayette/91st.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Western. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Western. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
